Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Lekythos
Description: Lekythos with an ovoid body and a tall ring base, with light mouldings on the outside. The narrow neck has a spout.  A handle connects the lip with the shoulder. Throwing marks are highly visible on the exterior surface. The upper section of the body is blackish.
